Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Racine
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th  buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Albany, Ogden, Western, 18th, Ashland and then resume their normal route at Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#18 16th-18th  buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Albany, Ogden, Western, 18th, Ashland and then resume their normal route at Roosevelt, due to street blockage near Cermak/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cermak/Racine
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Ashland, Roosevelt, Halsted and then resume their normal route at Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Ashland, Roosevelt, Halsted and then resume their normal route at Cermak, due to street blockage near Cermak/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.
